column8:
Art Blakey t-shirt.

 

Heralded as the inventor of modern bebop drumming, and one of the most influential musicians of the 20th Century, Art Blakey was a music legend. In a career that spanned over 50 years, Blakey was renowned for his phenomenal drumming speed, precision and soul. With his band, the Jazz Messengers, he nurtured a whole host of young and upcoming musicians who went on to become stars in their own right including Ginger Baker who is one of my personal favourites.

 

Buy our Art Blakey T-shirt and celebrate a truly great musician.
